TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed InstanceCompletionAction extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Contains options that specify whether the persistence provider should keep or delete the state information for an instance in the persistence store after the instance completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] ships with a SQL persistence provider as a constituent of the SQL Workflow Instance Store, which is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStore> class and is used to persist state information in to the SQL Server database. When the `InstanceCompletionAction` attribute is set to DeleteNothing for the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore> service behavior associated with a service, the SQL persistence provider keeps the instance state information for the instance in the SQL Server persistence database even after the instance completes, and when the `InstanceCompletionAction` attribute is set to DeleteAll (which is the default value), the persistence provider deletes all the instance state information when the instance completes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.DurableInstancing.InstanceCompletionAction DeleteAll = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that data and metadata for a workflow instance must be deleted from the persistence store after the workflow instance completes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.DurableInstancing.InstanceCompletionAction DeleteNothing = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that data and metadata for a workflow instance must be kept in the persistence database even after the workflow instance completes.
